name: Notion Tasks Tracker
description: The ultimate dashboard to track all your tasks and complete them on timeDo you manage a lot of tasks regularly but fail to keep a track of all of them effectively?Well, here's something you have been looking for all along.This is a Notion solution that makes it easy to manage all your task-related commitments in one place.Why Notion?The notion is available on every platform, with customizable layouts and a wide range of components and views including board view, gallery view, table view, and mor
features: Google Doc Template: A template file with placeholders in {{...}} format (e.g.,{{InvoiceNumber}},{{ClientName}}).; Notion Database: Acts as a database with matching headers likeClientName,InvoiceDatefor seamless placeholder mapping.; Task description,; Task priority (High, Medium, or Low); Task scheduled end date,; Category of tasks (such as Family, Work, Studies etc),; Task Efficiency (in %); Get a timeline of all the tasks for the period set to any date along with task status and priority.; Overall categories of the task and the total tasks allotted for each.
